tool_description: A helper tool for getting real-time details of any android app from PlayStore .
name: App Details from PlayStore
title: App Details from PlayStore

api_list.name: Badge from shields.io
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a particular attribute from the playstore data in a format that is recognized by the shields.io badges. This can be used in combination with shields.io for generating android app related badges with realtime values for your app's README file.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The package name of your android application.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: can be one among : **[ downloads, package, version, size, lastUpdated, rating, noOfUsersRated, developer ]**

api_list.name: JSON with all details
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the available details.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is where you will need to pass your app's unique id (or) sometimes called as package-name.

optional_parameters.name: forceUpdate
optional_parameters.description: Usually, this API caches the app's data for about an hour. Hence, if you want to override this cache (or) want **non-cached fresh** data of your app, you will have to set this parameter to ***true***.
